channel.title: Sam's Blog on Sam Sanders
channel.description: Recent content in Sam's Blog on Sam Sanders

item.title: Build vs Buy
item.description: I have a bias to buy rather than build. I have this bias primarily because when buying is even an option, then you can infer that there’s a market for that product. So you have to ask: “Is my core business competing in that market?” If the answer is “No,” that is, if your core business isn’t in the market of building products like the one you’re considering building, then the decision to build is hard to justify.

item.title: How I Made This
item.description: I wanted to make a website for myself, and to have a place where I could write things. Writing things that are available to the public internet is scary, but I figured it would help keep me honest. I also wanted to learn a new way to make a website. Now that I have one, I can write how I made it.

item.title: Second Post
item.description: This is another blog post. Just checking to see how it looks when multiple posts are listed.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hi, this is my first blog post. First blog posts can be really meaningful, or they can be a throwaway. This is probably a throwaway.
